sentences.english: Shoun was fond of music and was a master of the harp, which his mother also played.
sentences.chinese: 正安雅好音樂，是琵琶高手，他的母親也頗通此道。

sentences.english: Deeply touched, she invited Shoun to visit her the next evening and play. He accepted the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 她邀正安次夜到她的下處爲她演奏，他接受了邀請。

sentences.english: One day Shoun left for a distant temple to deliver a lecture.
sentences.chinese: 一天，正安前往遠方的寺廟講學。
